overview.title: Poultry Farming
overview.description: A complete 4-tier structured poultry training pathway covering production, biosecurity, post-harvest handling, processing, and agribusiness.

foundation.summary: Foundation level covering core poultry production principles, biosecurity basics, post-harvest handling, processing fundamentals and introduction to poultry agribusiness.

intermediate.summary: Intermediate level strengthening farm management, health systems, value addition, and market positioning.

advanced.summary: Advanced commercial poultry operations with financial planning, disease control systems, and scaling strategies.

specialisation.summary: Specialisation level for enterprise development, export readiness, integrated systems and institutional poultry models.
